Index (r) » Resource Types » rabbitmq_policy

Resource Type: rabbitmq_policy

Defined in:
lib/puppet/type/rabbitmq_policy.rb
Providers:
rabbitmqctl

Overview

Type for managing rabbitmq policies

Examples:

Create a rabbitmq_policy

rabbitmq_policy { 'ha-all@myvhost':
  pattern    => '.*',
  priority   => 0,
  applyto    => 'all',
  definition => {
    'ha-mode'      => 'all',
    'ha-sync-mode' => 'automatic',
  },
}

Properties

  • applyto (defaults to: all)

    policy apply to

    Supported values:
    • all
    • exchanges
    • queues
  • definition

    policy definition

  • ensure (defaults to: present)

    The basic property that the resource should be in.

    Supported values:
    • present
    • absent
  • pattern

    policy pattern

  • priority (defaults to: 0)

    policy priority

    Supported values:
    • %r{^\d+$}

Parameters

  • name (namevar)

    combination of policy@vhost to create policy for

    Supported values:
    • %r{^\S+@\S+$}
